docs.text: michael crichton has had a long career of writing novels , many of which are science fiction .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the most profitable film adaptation of any novel was an adaptation of a michael crichton science fiction novel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so in the logic of the film industry a good way to make a profitable film would be to make a big-budget adaptation of another crichton science fiction novel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: congo failed , and i am afraid that sphere is probably not going to fare a whole lot better .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it a little better than just okay novel and it makes a film that is not even that good .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film is expensive , over one hundred million dollars ; is long , 133 minutes ; has a terrific cast , including dustin hoffman , samuel l . jackson , and sharon stone ; but has little that is really original and less that is exciting .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: several years ago dr . norman goodman ( played by dustin hoffman ) was asked to write up a set of procedures for the government to follow if an alien entity was actually encountered .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plan he wrote was only semi-serious , but did explicitly define a team of experts who should investigate the alien .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: now that team has been assembled by a mysterious team leader named barnes ( peter coyote ) to study a spacecraft almost a half mile in length that apparently dropped into the pacific ocean in the early 1700s .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: suddenly norman's less than serious procedure has become an action plan for dealing with a real alien spacecraft .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: included in the team to investigate are mathematician harry adams ( samuel l . jackson ) , biologist beth halperin ( sharon stone ) , and astrophysicist ted fielding ( liev schreiber ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: together they travel to the deep pacific spaceship to understand its secrets .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one major secret is the meaning of the huge sphere of gold-toned liquid metal at the heart of this spaceship .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what is disappointing about this film is that it does not have really effective performances .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: director barry levinson is at his best with good actors rather than good special effects .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the problem here is he is making a big-budget science fiction film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it has some effects , but the most intriguing effect he shows only as an outline on a radar screen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the technique is to suggest rather than to show and let the actors and the viewer's imagination carry the film as robert wise did with the haunting .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that could be a reasonable approach in a low-budget film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but that requires creating much more atmosphere than levinson can manage to muster .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it requires the actors to give really compelling performances and simply put , they don't .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: hoffman's acting seems muted .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jackson seems to laid back .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we do not feel for these characters and do not get inside their heads .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: levinson paid big bucks for his actors and does not really get price performance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and why we have queen latifah as a minor functionary on the expedition is anybody's guess . a
docs.label: negative

docs.text: cast of unknowns could have delivered as much emotional impact at a fraction of the price .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: look how much more powerful a film like alien was with only moderate actors .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: most science fiction spectaculars these days have second-tier actors and first-tier special effects .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: levinson tries second-tier effects , and first-tier actors , but never makes that exchange pay off for the viewer .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: perhaps sci-fi spectaculars are just not an actor's medium .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the result gets a 4 on the 0 to 10 scale and 0 on the -4 to +4 scale .
